Definitions

A reference for commonly used terms by the EUROCONTROL Aviation Intelligence Unit and the Performance Review Commission.
Title
ASMA Transit Time
ATC Pre-departure Delay
ATFM Delay
ATFM Delay Codes
ATFM Measure
ATFM slot adherence
Additional ASMA Time
Additional Taxi-in Time
Additional Taxi-out Time
Air transport statistics
Airport operator data flow (APDF)
Airspace Infringement
Composite flight-hour
Departure Slot
ECAC Area
ESRA 2008 Area
EUROCONTROL Area
Economic Cost Effectiveness
En-route ATFM Delay
En-route Charging Zone
FAB - Functional Airspace Blocks
Flight Trajectory Models
IATA code 89
IATA delay codes
KEA
KEP

Primary delay
Productivity
